item.description:
This time, the deck will be the beautiful deck at the Hoerman’s in Hebron. The view is lovely, overlooking the pond, and we know the food will be great, because it’s potluck! When you RSVP, please post what brunch specialty you will be bringing, so we can try to plan a somewhat balanced menu! (Though it is brunch, so scrumptious with lots of calories is part of the plan!) Start time is 11:52 AM and the host has warned that late arrivals may not be seated!

Because this event is in a private home, you must RSVP for directions.
item.name: Brunch on the Deck, Take Two
